sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../' const Policy=()=>{ return( <>

privacy policy

  1. Data Collection: Our courses app only collects data that is necessary to provide you with the best possible learning experience. We collect information such as your name, email address, and course preferences to help personalize your learning journey. We will never sell or share your personal data with third-party advertisers or marketers.
  2. Data Storage: All of your data is stored securely on our servers and is only accessible by authorized personnel. We use industry-standard security measures such as encryption and firewalls to protect your data from unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration.
  3. Opt-Out: You have the right to opt-out of any communication from our courses app at any time. You can unsubscribe from our newsletters and promotional emails by clicking the unsubscribe link in the email. We will not send you any further marketing communication if you opt-out.
  4. Third-Party Services: Our courses app may use third-party services to enhance your learning experience, such as payment processing services. We ensure that all third-party services we use comply with data privacy laws and have their own privacy policies in place.
  5. Cookie Policy: We use cookies to enhance your learning experience and improve our courses app. Our cookies are encrypted and contain no personally identifiable information. You can choose to disable cookies in your browser settings if you wish.
  6. Children's Privacy: Our courses app is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect any personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have inadvertently collected personal information from a child under 13, we will take steps to delete the information as soon as possible.
  7. Updates: We reserve the right to update our privacy policy at any time. We will notify you of any changes to our policy by posting the updated policy on our website. It is your responsibility to review our privacy policy periodically to stay informed about any updates or changes.
) } export default Policy;
